title: Strengthening Elementary Mathematics Practical Competencies through Individualized Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Mathematics Concepts and Classroom Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Customized mathematics instruction competency development program for current elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their cognitive traits and learning styles to develop personalized learning plans.
Learners can implement teaching methods that strengthen students' mathematical learning motivation (self-concept, self-efficacy) by applying individualized learning strategies.
Learners can develop individualized learning design outcomes and verify their applicability in real-world settings through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
